thread.title: JetBlue passenger from NY hits attendant, threatens to blow up plane, FBI says
thread.title_full: JetBlue passenger from NY hits attendant, threatens to blow up plane, FBI says | OregonLive.com

author: Associated Press
title: JetBlue passenger from NY hits attendant, threatens to blow up plane, FBI says
text:
WEST PALM BEACH, Fla. â€” A passenger on a flight from New York City to South Florida has been arrested after authorities say he punched a flight attendant and threatened to blow up the plane.
A flight attendant for JetBlue Airways told the FBI he saw Alija Kucuk, 29, run down the aisle and push two other flight attendants out of the way on the Thursday flight.
The attendant tried to calm Kucuk down, but Kucuk allegedly pushed him into a door and punched him in the face, authorities said.
According to an FBI report, Kucuk used verbal epithets and racial slurs and threatened to blow up the plane. Kucuk was aboard JetBlue Airways Flight 153 from New York's John F. Kennedy International Airport to Palm Beach International Airport, investigators said.
Kucuk, of Middle Village in Queens, N.Y., was charged with interfering with a flight attendant and threatening to destroy an aircraft.
The Sun Sentinel reports Kucuk has been appointed a federal public defender, but his attorney declined comment.
